trans-unit.resname: Log Files
trans-unit.target: Fichiers de journalisations

trans-unit.resname: lycuslabs.com follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
trans-unit.source: lycuslabs.com follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services' analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users' movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
trans-unit.target: lycuslabs.com suit une procédure standard d'utilisation de fichiers journaux. Ces fichiers enregistrent les visiteurs lorsqu'ils visitent les sites Web. Toutes les sociétés d'hébergement le font et cela fait partie de l'analyse des services d'hébergement. Les informations recueillies par les fichiers journaux comprennent les adresses de protocole Internet (IP), le type de navigateur, le fournisseur d'accès Internet (FAI), la date et l'heure, les pages de référence et de sortie, et éventuellement le nombre de clics. Ces données ne sont pas liées à des informations permettant d'identifier une personne. L'objectif de ces informations est d'analyser les tendances, d'administrer le site, de suivre les mouvements des utilisateurs sur le site et de recueillir des informations démographiques.

The information is used to optimize the users' experience by customizing our web page content based on visitors' browser type and/or other information.

trans-unit.resname: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
trans-unit.source: CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
trans-unit.target: Droits à la vie privée de la CCPA (Ne vendez pas mes informations personnelles)

trans-unit.resname: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
trans-unit.source: Under the CCPA, among other rights, California consumers have the right to:
trans-unit.target: En vertu de la CCPA, entre autres droits, les consommateurs californiens ont le droit de :

trans-unit.resname: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
trans-unit.source: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
trans-unit.target: Demander à une entreprise qui collecte les données personnelles d'un consommateur de divulguer les catégories et les éléments spécifiques des données personnelles qu'elle a collectées sur les consommateurs.

trans-unit.resname: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
trans-unit.source: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
trans-unit.target: Demander à une entreprise de supprimer toutes les données personnelles qu'elle a recueillies sur le consommateur.

trans-unit.resname: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
trans-unit.source: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data, not sell the consumer's personal data.
trans-unit.target: Demandez qu'une entreprise qui vend les données personnelles d'un consommateur ne vende pas les données personnelles de ce dernier.

trans-unit.resname: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
trans-unit.source: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
trans-unit.target: Si vous faites une demande, nous avons un mois pour vous répondre. Si vous souhaitez exercer l'un de ces droits, veuillez nous contacter.

trans-unit.resname: GDPR Data Protection Rights
trans-unit.target: Droits de protection des données GDPR

trans-unit.resname: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
trans-unit.source: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
trans-unit.target: Nous tenons à nous assurer que vous êtes pleinement conscient de tous vos droits en matière de protection des données. Chaque utilisateur a les droits suivants :

trans-unit.resname: - The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
trans-unit.source: - The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
trans-unit.target: - Le droit d'accès - Vous avez le droit de demander des copies de vos données personnelles. Nous pouvons vous facturer une petite somme pour ce service.

trans-unit.resname: - The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
trans-unit.source: - The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
trans-unit.target: Le droit de rectification - Vous avez le droit de nous demander de corriger toute information que vous jugez inexacte. Vous avez également le droit de nous demander de compléter les informations qui, selon vous, sont incomplètes.

trans-unit.resname: - The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.source: - The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: - Le droit à l'effacement - Vous avez le droit de nous demander d'effacer vos données personnelles, sous certaines conditions.

trans-unit.resname: - The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.source: - The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: - Le droit de restreindre le traitement - Vous avez le droit de nous demander de restreindre le traitement de vos données personnelles, sous certaines conditions.

trans-unit.resname: - The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.source: - The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: - Le droit de s'opposer au traitement - Vous avez le droit de vous opposer à notre traitement de vos données personnelles, sous certaines conditions.

trans-unit.resname: - The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.source: - The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: - Le droit à la portabilité des données - Vous avez le droit de nous demander de transférer les données que nous avons collectées à une autre organisation, ou directement à vous, sous certaines conditions.

trans-unit.resname: - If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

trans-unit.resname: Arbitration shall be initiated through the American Arbitration Association, an established alternative dispute resolution provider that offers arbitration as set forth in this section. If AAA is not available to arbitrate, the parties shall agree to select an alternative ADR Provider. The rules of the ADR Provider shall govern all aspects of the arbitration except to the extent such rules are in conflict with the Terms. The AAA Consumer Arbitration Rules governing the arbitration are available online at adr.org or by calling the AAA at 1-800-778-7879. The arbitration shall be conducted by a single, neutral arbitrator. Any claims or disputes where the total amount of the award sought is less than Ten Thousand U.S. Dollars (US $10,000.00) may be resolved through binding non-appearance-based arbitration, at the option of the party seeking relief. For claims or disputes where the total amount of the award sought is Ten Thousand U.S. Dollars (US $10,000.00) or more, the right to a hearing will be determined by the Arbitration Rules. Any hearing will be held in a location within 100 miles of your residence, unless you reside outside of the United States, and unless the parties agree otherwise. If you reside outside of the U.S., the arbitrator shall give the parties reasonable notice of the date, time and place of any oral hearings. Any judgment on the award rendered by the arbitrator may be entered in any court of competent jurisdiction. If the arbitrator grants you an award that is greater than the last settlement offer that the Company made to you prior to the initiation of arbitration, the Company will pay you the greater of the award or $2,500.00. Each party shall bear its own costs and disbursements arising out of the arbitration and shall pay an equal share of the fees and costs of the ADR Provider.

trans-unit.resname: If arbitration is initiated, the arbitrator will decide the rights and liabilities of you and the Company, and the dispute will not be consolidated with any other matters or joined with any other cases or parties. SERVICES

trans-unit.resname: At Lycuslabs, we share a common passion for immersive technologies, especially 3D, VR and AR, and are fascinated by the enormous possibilities they offer. Our mission is to bring a unique experience of transforming the perception of the border between your imagination and reality. And it is our specialty to create interactive visual solutions for architects, designers, digital agencies, and businesses in various fields. Our goal is to develop applications that convey your message to the world in the most elegant and clear way possible.
trans-unit.source: At Lycuslabs, we share a common passion for immersive technologies, especially 3D, VR and AR, and are fascinated by the enormous possibilities they offer. Our mission is to bring a unique experience of transforming the perception of the border between your imagination and reality. And it is our specialty to create interactive visual solutions for architects, designers, digital agencies, and businesses in various fields. Our goal is to develop applications that convey your message to the world in the most elegant and clear way possible.
trans-unit.target: Chez Lycuslabs, nous partageons une passion commune pour les technologies immersives, notamment la 3D, la RV et la RA, et sommes fascinés par les énormes possibilités qu'elles offrent. Notre mission est d'apporter une expérience unique de transformation de la perception de la frontière entre votre imagination et la réalité. Et c'est notre spécialité de créer des solutions visuelles interactives pour les architectes, les designers, les agences numériques et les entreprises dans divers domaines. Notre objectif est de développer des applications qui transmettent votre message au monde entier de la manière la plus élégante et la plus claire possible.

trans-unit.resname: Our team includes the top 3D specialists, technology experts and designers in the industry. We believe that constant innovation is the key to building successful products. As a growing software development startup, we’re passionate and enthusiastic about experimenting with latest emerging technologies and strive to integrate creative vision, technical expertise and project management capabilities to ensure customer satisfaction.
trans-unit.source: Our team includes the top 3D specialists, technology experts and designers in the industry. We believe that constant innovation is the key to building successful products. As a growing software development startup, we’re passionate and enthusiastic about experimenting with latest emerging technologies and strive to integrate creative vision, technical expertise and project management capabilities to ensure customer satisfaction.
trans-unit.target: Notre équipe comprend les meilleurs spécialistes 3D, experts en technologie et designers du secteur. Nous pensons que l'innovation constante est la clé du succès des produits. En tant que startup de développement de logiciels en pleine croissance, nous sommes passionnés et enthousiastes à l'idée d'expérimenter les dernières technologies émergentes et nous nous efforçons d'intégrer une vision créative, une expertise technique et des capacités de gestion de projet pour garantir la satisfaction du client.
